summary: Habit tracker app with improved usability and mobile-ready design. Adding placeholder habits to demonstrate usage.

existing_features.title: Update the empty-state UI in the HabitList component to show a helpful onboarding message only when there truly are no habits, since placeholder habits will now cover most new-user scenarios. Ensure the empty state text remains accurate (e.g., 'No habits yet â€” tap + to add your first habit').

new_feature_requests.summary: Add placeholder/demo habits (e.g. Morning walk, drink 1L of water) to demonstrate app usage

Pre-populate the backend with a set of placeholder habits so new users see example content when they first open the app. Include at least 5 varied habits such as: 'Morning Walk' (description: 'Start your day with a 30-minute walk'), 'Drink 1L of Water' (description: 'Stay hydrated throughout the day'), 'Read for 20 Minutes' (description: 'Read a book or article before bed'), 'Meditate' (description: '5-minute breathing exercise'), and 'No Junk Food' (description: 'Avoid processed snacks and sugary drinks'). These should be inserted during canister initialization (only if no habits exist yet) so they are not duplicated on upgrades.
